Description:
Required Skills to be successful:Understanding of Electrical principles and systems
Understanding of Hydraulic principles and systems
Understanding of Diesel Engine principles
Understanding of Warranty Terms and Conditions
Understanding of Volvo tooth system
Understanding of Volvo filters and lubricants
Ability to overhaul Engines, Transmission/Drivelines and hydraulic components
Ability to install and service Air conditioning units and carry out charging and discharging of an AC system in a safe manner with environmental awareness. About the Team:In this position you will be reporting to the workshop supervisor and working in a diverse, fast paced environment.  What equips you for the role:Advanced Diploma in Automotive Engineering
Minimum experience: 4 yearsJob Details
